diff_act: 4.restore loudspeaker volume to its initial level
5.transmitting audio to other users in the group

regen.absent_element: specification for handling loudspeaker volume when lifting the handset
regen.new_specification: The system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted.

regen.absent_element: automatic volume restoration when lifting the handset
regen.new_specification: The system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume automatically when the handset is lifted and restore it to its initial level when the handset is replaced.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling the Push-To-Talk function during group calls
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the Push-To-Talk function to allow a user to transmit audio to other users in the group only when the button is pressed, and cease transmission when the button is released.

label: Picking up the handset shall reduce the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level.
absence: action of reducing the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level
